UIUX design

Backpacker Mobile App

Task

"Backpacker" is a travel app targeting adventurous backpackers who like discovering the unique traveling experience all over the world. Different from normal trip apps, "Backpacker" encourages people to walk out of the comfortable zone, thus won't include hotel booking, but will provide accommodation advice along with the adventure list.

This is a self-launched project, aiming to integrate my UIUX skills into a suppositional mobile app. From conception to UI design, from design system to mockup, I started everything from scratch to make sure my final work is coherent and systematic.

Areas

#UIUX design

#InVision

#Figma

#Design system

#Mobile app

Design System

Starting from choosing fonts and colors, defining shadow, spacing, border-radius, and other basics, I've gradually completed my design system based on 3 categories: foundation, branding, and UI components.
